info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, western Broadwater, west central Meagher, north central Madison, Jefferson and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 615 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of East Helena to 10 miles northwest of Whitehall. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Townsend, Boulder, East Helena, Whitehall, Pony, Montana City, Cardwell, Lewis And Clark Caverns State Park, Silos, Clancy, and Jefferson City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
